title: UI Artist, Games Studio
overview: The UI Artist, Games Studio at Netflix is responsible for creating rich and dynamic visuals, including UI assets, menus, HUD elements, and 2D game art, with a focus on kinetic motion graphics and intuitive layouts. They collaborate with designers and engineers to bring their work to life and strive to create memorable game moments. The ideal candidate has 3+ years of experience as a UI artist, knowledge of UX design, proficiency with Unity and art tools, and strong communication skills. Strong traditional illustration skills and familiarity with social party games are considered a bonus. The position is preferred to be based in Los Angeles, but remote work is also an option.

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Assets - Create final UI assets that will live on top of our game environments
Animation - Use art tools to clearly demonstrate the intended transitions and kinetic motion design of your UI elements
Graybox - Create UI mockups that block out layouts and composition
Menus - Work closely with designers to map out the flow of our game menus
Accessibility - Collaborate with the rest of the team to improve usability and accessibility
Collaboration - Provide and receive creative/team feedback, ‚Äúyes, and‚Äù others‚Äô creative contributions, and provide clear creative goals with specific outcomes

extras.title: Requirements
content: 3+ years experience as a UI artist with at least 1 shipped title
Good knowledge of UX design with the ability to visualize the game holistically
Experienced with Unity and able to create Unity assets and prefabs
Experienced with art tools such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, After Effects, etc.
